article_title: CVS Stops Tobacco Sales Today, Changes Name To Reflect New Era

article_metadata.description: CVS, the giant drugstore chain that shocked the U.S. public health community and Wall Street with its decision earlier this year to remove tobacco products from its shelves by October, said cigarettes are officially no longer on store shelves a month ahead of schedule. The move to remove tobacco products effective [...]
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen
